name: Orbital Cultivation
description:
"Orbital Cultivation" follows two lovers through a broken down spaceship. Fix up the ship and prepare for landing on a new planet.  Explore rooms, talk to skeletons and teddy bears, and get to know the two lovers along the way. 

Scattered around the spaceship are poems that weave together a narrative of loss, love, and renewal. 

Gameplay

Complete puzzles in each room to advance through the ship. Chests will contain the items you need to move to the next room.

Use arrow keys to move around. Click SPACE to interact with objects.

Credits

This game was lovingly created by Manahil Bandukwala and Liam Burke.  The music was composed by Liam Burke. 

"Orbital Cultivation" is the companion game to a chapbook of poetry. The poems are a golden shovel of Phyllis Webb's poem, "And In Our Time." Read about the poetry book here.
